sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of diseases affecting the throat and the tongue. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry she tui 蛇 蛻：治驚癇、癜駁、喉舌諸疾 , “To cure fright epilepsy, patches and variegations, and all types of ailments of the throat and the tongue ”.
